name: Army Truck Offroad
description:
Army Truck Offroad is an exciting and realistic truck driving game, get ready to play an extreme army cargo truck simulation game.

Army Truck Offroad is the ultimate duty job on the hill to transport soldiers by the twisted terrain climbing road, so enjoy driving and simulation experience. You have to drive to see your driving skills and take the army soldiers and to deliver them to their destiny with safety and no time waste.

Game FEATURES
* Wonderful mountain and jungle environments.
* Realistic war situation with stunning sound effects.
* Realistic army cargo truck with physics.
* Multiple missions from easy to difficult.
* Free to play game with addictive gameplay.
